attributes.action: Allow the BBC to continue its plan to increase the Licence Fee up to £180
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC provides exceptional TV, Radio and Online content, unrivalled in quality, diversity and relevance to the British population. 

We as a nation are happy to pay the increased licence fee to maintain the high levels of broadcasting.
attributes.background: Revoke the decision taken by Nadine Dorries MP to freeze the BBC Licence Fee, and allow them to increase at the rate previously required. The BBC is a trusted broadcaster worldwide and of that Britain should be proud. The Government should encourage the wide range of programming, National and Local.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Increase the TV licence in line with inflation and maintain BBC funding
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606445
